greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n*n in carryless arithmetic mod 9 in base 10.
comment: Addition and multiplication are the same as in school, that is, done in base 10, except that there are no carries and individual digits are added or multiplied mod 9.
link: Index entries for sequences related to carryless arithmetic
xref: Cf. A010878, A169908. See A170990 for a better version.
results.author: _David Applegate_, _Marc LeBrun_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 11 2010
